Tomato___Late_blight: Late blight (Phytophthora infestans): Remove affected leaves, avoid overhead watering, apply a systemic fungicide labelled for late blight following instructions, and rotate crops next season.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight: Northern Leaf Blight: Remove heavily infected debris, use resistant varieties when possible, apply approved fungicides at label rates during early disease development.
Tomato___healthy: Healthy tomato: Maintain consistent watering, balanced fertilizer, and monitor weekly for early signs of disease.
